mapper.insert: insert into calendar(no, title, start_date, end_date, employee_no ) values(my_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{employee.no})
mapper.select: select c.no as no, c.title as title, c.start_date as startDate, c.end_date as endDate, e.no as "employee.no", e.position as "employee.position", e.department as "employee.dept" from calendar c, employee e where c.employee_no = e.no and e.position = 'director' or e.no = #{employee.no}
